page.title: 06THE LIBRARY
page.content: The library was first opened in 1968. There are two librarians in attendance. It has a membership of 4623. To become a member a person has to be over 16 to sign for books . If under 16 he/she must have a parent or guardian's signature in order to become a member. Members are allowed to borrow 4_6 books at a time and can hold them for up to a month. The most popular books which are borrowed are Westerns, love stories, crime and adventure. Books are supplied from headquarters in Omagh. Damage to books must be paid by borrowers. Other library services include reference books, magazines, films, records and cassettes and comuter software.
